name: Blip.tv - Large SD Player
description:
Makes the flash video player larger on Blip.tv video pages that are not HD.
You should disable this style for HD video pages, as they are already large.

I will try support this Style if Blip makes a layout change.
(Preview images are out of date)

user.name: BRYN
